hero.name: Jinseong Kang
hero.subdescription:
6th-year frontend developer specializing in React, Vue.js, and Next.js. 
I also handle backend and deployment when the project calls for it.

about.subtitle: Introduction
about.title: About Me
about.description:
Since 2020, I've worked as a frontend developer across a wide range of projects.
At Company A, I led a team as lead researcher for 2.5 years and built the GreenCar next-gen fleet management system.
As a freelancer at SK Hynix, I delivered an SI project.
Currently handling an e-commerce frontend while taking on diverse freelance projects.
about.experienceDesc: Specialized in frontend with hands-on experience across React, Vue.js, Next.js, and more.
about.focusDesc: SPA & SSR development with React/Next.js and Vue.js/Nuxt.js. I can also handle backend and deployment when needed.
about.passionDesc: Freelance, contract, or full-time. Experienced with projects of all sizes, from small apps to enterprise SI.

skills.subtitle: Tech Stack

skills.description: Frontend is my core strength. I also work with backend and infrastructure tools as needed.
